page.title: 13PORTHMADOG SOCIAL LIFE
page.content: Social life starts at an early age with the{Mother and Toddler Groups}for the very young.When old enough to go without their mothers the children join a{Play Group}until they of an age to start at school.After finishing school for the day,boys and girls either go dancing at discos or play games such as football,hockey or netball.There is a{Day Centre}caring for those pensioners who are house- bound through illness,taxis bringing them to meet their friends three times a week.They stay all day,have their meels and do their handwork.There is also a{Meals on Wheels}service twice a week whereby dinners are delivered by car to pensioners' homes by voluntary helpers.
